nokey.developer_tools package

Submodules

nokey.developer_tools.apis_guru module

class nokey.developer_tools.apis_guru.APIsGuru[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the APIs.guru API.

Attributes: - base_url: The base url for the APIs.guru API. - about: A short description of the API.

get_all_apis()[source]

Returns a list of all the APIs in the API directory.

Args: - None

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing a list of all the APIs in the directory.

get_all_providers()[source]

Returns a list of all the providers in the API directory.

Args: - None

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing a list of all the providers in the directory.

get_apis_by_provider(provider)[source]

Returns a list of all the APIs for a particular provider.

Args: - provider (str): The name of the api provider.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing a list of all the APIs for a particular provider.

get_basic_metrics()[source]

Returns basic metrics for the entire API directory.

Args: - None

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing basic metrics for the entire directory.

get_docs_url()[source]

Returns the URL for the APIs.guru API documentation.

Args: - None

Returns: - string: The URL for the API docs.

get_particular_api_version_no_service_name(provider, api)[source]

Returns the API entry for one specific version of an API where there is no service name.

Args: - provider (str): The name of the provider. - api (str): The api.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing the API entry for one specific version of an API where there is no service name.

get_particular_api_version_with_service_name(provider, service, api)[source]

Returns the API entry for one specific version of an API where there is a s ervice name.

Args: - provider (str): The name of the provider. - service (str): The name of the service. - api (str): The name of the API.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing the API entry for one specific version of an API where there is a service name.

get_service_names_by_provider(provider)[source]

Returns a list of all the services for a particular provider.

Args: - provider (str): The name of the provider.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing a list of all the services for a particular provider.

nokey.developer_tools.microlink module

class nokey.developer_tools.microlink.Microlink[source]

Bases: object

A class for interacting with the Microlink API.

Attributes: - base_url: The base URL of the API. - about: A short description of the API.

get_color_palette_for_target_url(url)[source]

Returns metadata containing the predominant color pallette for each image detected over the target URL.

Args: - url (str): The target URL.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary of metadata containing the predominant color pallette for each image detected over the target URL.

get_docs_url()[source]

Returns the URL for the Microlink API documentation.

Args: - None

Returns: - string: The URL for the API docs.

get_metadata_for_target_url(url)[source]

Returns metadata for the target URL.

Args: - url (str): The target URL.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing metadata for the target URL.

get_pdf_of_target_url(url)[source]

Returns the URL for a pdf of the target URL.

Args: - url (str): The target URL.

Returns: - string: The URL for the pdf of the target URL.

get_screenshot_of_target_url(url)[source]

Returns the URL for a screenshot of the target URL.

Args: - url (str): The target URL.

Returns: - string: The URL for the screenshot of the target URL.

nokey.developer_tools.url_haus module

class nokey.developer_tools.url_haus.URLHaus[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the URLHaus API.

Attributes: - base_url: The base URL of the API. - about: A short description of the API.

download_malware_sample(sha256)[source]

Downloads a zip file containing the malware sample (payload).

Args: - base_url (str): The base URL of the API. - sha256 (str): The SHA256 hash identifying the malware sample (payload) to be downloaded.

Returns: - str: Path to the downloaded ZIP file if successful, error message otherwise.

get_docs_url()[source]

Returns the URL for the URLHaus API documentation.

Args: - None

Returns: - string: The URL for the API docs.

get_info_about_host(host)[source]

Returns any information URLHaus may have about a specific host.

Args: - host (str): The IPv4 address, domain name, or hostname in question.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing information about a specific host.

get_info_about_payload(p_load)[source]

Returns any information URLHaus has about a specific payload (malware sample).

Args: - p_load (str): The MD5 hash or SHA256 hash of the payload (malware sample).

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing information about a specific payload.

get_info_about_signature(signature)[source]

Returns any information URLHaus has about a specific signature.

Args: - signature (str): The signature to query.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing information about a specific signature.

get_info_about_tag(tag)[source]

Returns any information URLHaus has about a specific tag.

Args: - tag (str): The tag to query.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing information about a specific tag.

get_info_about_url(url)[source]

Returns any information URLHaus may have about a specific URL.

Args: - url (str): The URL in question.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing information about a specific URL.

get_info_about_url_by_id(urlID)[source]

Returns any information URLHaus may have about a specific URL.

Args: - urlID (int): The id of the URL in question.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing information about a specific URL.

get_recent_payloads(limit=None)[source]

Returns a list of recent payloads seen by URLHaus.

Args: - limit (int): Optional limit of payloads returned. Defaults to None.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing a list of recent payloads seen by URLHaus.

get_recent_urls(limit=None)[source]

Returns a list of recent URLs added to URLHaus.

Args: - limit (int): Optional limit of URLs returned. Defaults to None.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing a list of recent URLs added to URLHaus.

nokey.developer_tools.url_shortener module

class nokey.developer_tools.url_shortener.UrlShortener[source]

Bases: object

A class for interacting with the URL Shortener API.

Attributes: - base_url: The base URL of the URL Shortener API. - about: A short description of the API.

get_docs_url()[source]

Returns the URL for the URL Shortener API documentation.

Args: - None

Returns: - string: The URL for the API docs

shorten_url(url, shorturl=None)[source]

Returns the shortened URL for the given parameters.

Args: - url (str): The original URL to be shortened. - shorturl (str): Optional parameter for a desired short URL if available (case sensitive). Must be between 5 and 30 characters. Defaults to None.

Returns: - dict: Dictionary containing the shortened URL.
